snippet: First Gérard Depardieu. Now Brigitte Bardot. France's most famous movie icon is threatening to flee to Russia. But this time it's not about taxes -- it's about elephants.
abstract: First Gérard Depardieu. Now Brigitte Bardot. France's most famous movie icon is threatening to flee to Russia. But this time it's not about taxes -- it's about elephants.

headline.main: French Screen Diva Threatens Russia Exile, Too
